articles.description: Actor, producer and author, Priyanka Chopra Jonas has been appointed chairperson of the Mumbai Film Festival, which will take on a new format without a competitive international section. For the second year running, the festival (aka Jio MAMI) will not go ahe…
articles.content:

articles.title: Tragic! Popular VJ and Tamil actor Ananda Kannan passes away at 48, celebs mourn the loss - Times of India
articles.description: Popular television host, VJ and actor Anandha Kannan passed away on the night of August 16. He was battling cancer since long time and left for the heavenly abode at the age of 48. Kannan was a very renowned host of 90s and early 2000s known for his unqiue st…

articles.author: Karen Pereira
articles.title: Johnny Depp, Priyanka Chopra, Kangana Ranaut: Celebrities who claimed they were boycotted by the film industry - Times of India
articles.description: While Johnny Depp may be among the first few stars to go public with his allegations, he is not alone. From Kangana Ranaut to Jim Caviezel, late actor Sushant Singh Rajput, and many others have also spoken about the dark side of the film business.
articles.content: Jim Caviezel was an all-American heartthrob with several hit films to his credit. However, after taking on his career-defining role of Jesus Christ in Mel Gibson's biblical drama 'The Passion of The … [+408 chars]
